_examples.PRE-MARKUP:
An example of a credit card bill (invoice).
ACME Bank
Bill for: January 2015 Visa
invoice link: http://www.acmebank.com/invoice.pdf
Customer: Jane Doe
account ID: xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-1234
payment due: 2015-01-30
minimum payment: $15.00
total due: $200.00
billing period: 2014-12-21 to 2015-01-20
payment due

_properties.descriptionZh: 账户的编号，例如银行账号，软件系统登陆账号。
_properties.rdfs:comment: The identifier for the account the payment will be applied to.
_properties.rdfs:label: accountId

_properties.descriptionZh: 单据结算的时间间隔。
_properties.rdfs:comment: The time interval used to compute the invoice.
_properties.rdfs:label: billingPeriod

_properties.descriptionZh: 安排买方和卖方进行交易的实体。 大多数情况下，经纪人从未获取或发布交易所涉及的产品或服务的所有权。
_properties.rdfs:comment: An entity that arranges for an exchange between a buyer and a seller.  In most cases a broker never acquires or releases ownership of a product or service involved in an exchange.  If it is not clear whether an entity is a broker, seller, or buyer, the latter two terms are preferred.
_properties.rdfs:label: broker

_properties.descriptionZh: 该项的类别。
_properties.rdfs:comment: A category for the item. Greater signs or slashes can be used to informally indicate a category hierarchy.
_properties.rdfs:label: category

_properties.descriptionZh: 已经收到的订单或者付款的确认编号。
_properties.rdfs:comment: A number that confirms the given order or payment has been received.
_properties.rdfs:label: confirmationNumber

_properties.descriptionZh: 下单或支付单据的一方。
_properties.rdfs:comment: Party placing the order or paying the invoice.
_properties.rdfs:label: customer

_properties.descriptionZh: Invoice类型实体此次需要支付的最小金额
_properties.rdfs:comment: The minimum payment required at this time.
_properties.rdfs:label: minimumPaymentDue

_properties.descriptionZh: 最晚付款日期
_properties.rdfs:comment: The date that payment is due.
_properties.rdfs:label: paymentDueDate

_properties.descriptionZh: 信用卡的名称或订单的其他付款方式
_properties.rdfs:comment: The name of the credit card or other method of payment for the order.
_properties.rdfs:label: paymentMethod

_properties.descriptionZh: 使用付款方式的标识符，例如信用卡的最后4位数字
_properties.rdfs:comment: An identifier for the method of payment used (e.g. the last 4 digits of the credit card).
_properties.rdfs:label: paymentMethodId

_properties.descriptionZh: 付款状况，例如发票是否已付款？
_properties.rdfs:comment: The status of payment; whether the invoice has been paid or not.
_properties.rdfs:label: paymentStatus

_properties.descriptionZh: 服务提供商，服务运营商或服务执行者; 货物生产者。 另一方（卖方）可以代表提供者提供这些服务或商品。 提供商也可以作为卖方。
_properties.rdfs:comment: The service provider, service operator, or service performer; the goods producer. Another party (a seller) may offer those services or goods on behalf of the provider. A provider may also serve as the seller.
_properties.rdfs:label: provider

_properties.descriptionZh: 与此收据对应的客户订单。 一个收据可以对应一个或多个订单。
_properties.rdfs:comment: The Order(s) related to this Invoice. One or more Orders may be combined into a single Invoice.
_properties.rdfs:label: referencesOrder

_properties.descriptionZh: 预约的支付日期
_properties.rdfs:comment: The date the invoice is scheduled to be paid.
_properties.rdfs:label: scheduledPaymentDate

_properties.descriptionZh: 应该支付的总金额
_properties.rdfs:comment: The total amount due.
_properties.rdfs:label: totalPaymentDue

_pTree.descriptionZh: 发票、帐单或标签，是卖方向买方发出的与销售交易相关的商业单据，其上指明卖方为买方提供的产品或服务的数量和约定价格。
_pTree.rdfs:comment: A statement of the money due for goods or services; a bill.
_pTree.rdfs:label: Invoice

_properties.descriptionZh: 该项的一个附加类型， 通常用于从外部词典中向微数据语法添加更加具体的类型。它表示事物和事物本身所属的类之间的关系。在RDFa语法中, 对多类型最好使用‘typeof’属性这样的本地RDFa语法. Schema.org 工具对额外类型的理解较弱，特别是外部定义的额外类型。
_properties.rdfs:comment: An additional type for the item, typically used for adding more specific types from external vocabularies in microdata syntax. This is a relationship between something and a class that the thing is in. In RDFa syntax, it is better to use the native RDFa syntax - the 'typeof' attribute - for multiple types. Schema.org tools may have only weaker understanding of extra types, in particular those defined externally.
_properties.rdfs:label: additionalType

_properties.descriptionZh: 该项的别名。
_properties.rdfs:comment: An alias for the item.
_properties.rdfs:label: alternateName

_properties.descriptionZh: 该项的一个简单描述。
_properties.rdfs:comment: A description of the item.
_properties.rdfs:label: description

_examples.MICRODATA:
George Bush, the
  41st President of the United States
  is the father of
  
    George W. Bush, the
    43rd President of the United States.

_examples.RDFA:

  41st President of the United States
  is the father of
  
    George W. Bush, the
    43rd President of the United States.

_properties.descriptionZh: 描述的子属性。 用于消除与其他类似项之间歧义的简短描述。 其它属性（特别是名称）的信息对于消歧义可能是必要的。
_properties.rdfs:comment: A sub property of description. A short description of the item used to disambiguate from other, similar items. Information from other properties (in particular, name) may be necessary for the description to be useful for disambiguation.
_properties.rdfs:label: disambiguatingDescription

_properties.descriptionZh: 标识符
_properties.rdfs:comment: The identifier property represents any kind of identifier for any kind of Thing, such as ISBNs, GTIN codes, UUIDs etc. Schema.org provides dedicated properties for representing many of these, either as textual strings or as URL (URI) links. See background notes for more details.
_properties.rdfs:label: identifier

_examples.MICRODATA:
Mom's World Famous Banana Bread
  By John Smith,
  May 8, 2009
  
  This classic banana bread recipe comes
  from my mom -- the walnuts add a nice texture and flavor to the banana
  bread.
  Prep Time: 15 minutes
  Cook time: 1 hour
  Yield: 1 loaf
  Tags: Low fat
  
    Nutrition facts:
    240 calories,
    9 grams fat
  
  Ingredients:
  - 3 or 4 ripe bananas, smashed
  - 1 egg
  - 3/4 cup of sugar
  ...
  Instructions:
  
  Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Mix in the ingredients in a bowl. Add
  the flour last. Pour the mixture into a loaf pan and bake for one hour.
  
  140 comments:
  
    
    
  
  From Janel, May 5 -- thank you, great recipe!
  ...
_examples.PRE-MARKUP:
Mom's World Famous Banana Bread
By John Smith, May 8, 2009

This classic banana bread recipe comes from my mom -- the walnuts add a nice
 texture and flavor to the banana bread.
Prep Time: 15 minutes
Cook time: 1 hour
Yield: 1 loaf
Tags: Low fat
Nutrition facts:
240 calories, 9 grams fat
Ingredients:
- 3 or 4 ripe bananas, smashed
- 1 egg
- 3/4 cup of sugar
...
Instructions:
 Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Mix in the ingredients in a bowl. Add the
 flour last. Pour the mixture into a loaf pan and bake for one hour.
140 comments:
From Janel, May 5 -- thank you, great recipe!
...

_examples.MICRODATA:
ACME Hotel Innsbruck
  
  A beautifully located business hotel right in the
heart of the alps. Watch the sun rise over the scenic Inn valley while
enjoying your morning coffee.

_properties.descriptionZh: 图片
_properties.rdfs:comment: An image of the item. This can be a URL or a fully described ImageObject.
_properties.rdfs:label: image

_properties.descriptionZh: 表示这个东西是描述的主要实体的页面
_properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates a page (or other CreativeWork) for which this thing is the main entity being described. See background notes for details.
_properties.rdfs:label: mainEntityOfPage

_properties.descriptionZh: 条目的名称
_properties.rdfs:comment: The name of the item.
_properties.rdfs:label: name

_properties.descriptionZh: 潜在的与之搭配的动作，它描述了一个理想化的动作，在这个动作中，这个东西会起到“对象”的作用。
_properties.rdfs:comment: Indicates a potential Action, which describes an idealized action in which this thing would play an 'object' role.
_properties.rdfs:label: potentialAction

_properties.descriptionZh: 两个概念等价
_properties.rdfs:comment: URL of a reference Web page that unambiguously indicates the item's identity. E.g. the URL of the item's Wikipedia page, Wikidata entry, or official website.
_properties.rdfs:label: sameAs
